name: EmuGBA
tagline: EmuGBA is a GBA emulator for all iOS 5 and up. Run this page on your iOS Safari and add to your home screen. Created by Tomo Yamamoto.
body:
### Welcome to EmuGBA repository page!
Click here to download EmuGBA for iOS devices.
Create a Google Account. You will need it when adding a ROM.
Created by Tomo Yamamoto for a computer science project on HTML5 emulator.

### Features
Version 1.5
* Remembers your ROM save state allowing you to continue playing where you left off.
* 8-bit audio.
* Store all your Game Boy and Game Boy Color ROM and cover art in Google Drive.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
